docs.text: Welcome to BFWiki # For full documentation visit Commands # mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout # mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. It's setup by mkdocs.org .
docs.title: Welcome to BFWiki
